author: Krista Torres
title: 17 Signs Mommy Needs A Drink
text:
View this image ›
jna_otis / Via instagram.com ID: 10363872 2. When your kid starts talking about you. View this image ›
Twitter: @angelzwrld ID: 10363819 3. When you walk in the door. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10363753 4. When you just spent nine whole months sober. View this image ›
Twitter: @kizzlethizzle ID: 10363740 5. When your kids are wired for the day. View this image ›
Twitter: @shejustglows ID: 10363799 6. When coffee just isn’t strong enough. View this image ›
Twitter: @chrys_power ID: 10363766 7. When you have to shop with your kids. View this image ›
Twitter: @JJHo21 ID: 10363844 8. When you’re experiencing the “terrible twos.” View this image ›
someecards ID: 10363937 9. Or when you’re experiencing the terrible fours and fives. View this image ›
Twitter: @BWeinel ID: 10365514 10. When you successfully make it through another summer break. View this image ›
Twitter: @mommyrunsit ID: 10363776 11. When your morning starts with laundry. View this image ›
Twitter: @jenntufaro ID: 10363848 12. When you’re just so sick of juice. View this image ›
bamagirlnicole / Via instagram.com ID: 10363890 13. When you have to travel with your kid. View this image ›
Twitter: @JackieGordon ID: 10364102 14. When you’re trying to take family photos. View this image ›
Twitter: @B_Stapleton ID: 10365600 15. When your local grocery store starts to drop hints. View this image ›
Twitter: @jrsoronen ID: 10365504 16. Or when your local liquor store has a Girl Scout cookie stand in front of it. View this image ›
Twitter: @kyla_rayray ID: 10365453 17. And, finally, when you see other moms facing the same struggles you do. View this image ›
